e.v: Anda dapat menjual barang yang dibiayai kapan saja. Sisa saldo harus dibayar dari hasil penjualan.
Pilih cakupan pencarian Anda. Tingkat lebih tinggi lebih mahal dan lebih lama, tetapi memiliki tingkat keberhasilan dan kualitas lebih baik.
Cari dealer terdekat. Respons 1 bulan dijamin, biaya 2%, keberhasilan 40%.
Cari jaringan regional. 1-3 bulan, biaya 6%, keberhasilan 70%.
Cari seluruh negeri. 2-6 bulan, biaya 12%, keberhasilan 85%.
Kualitas rendah = harga lebih murah tapi perlu lebih banyak perbaikan
Tidak ada pembiayaan atau sewa aktif.
Biayai kendaraan dari toko (tombol F). Cari peralatan bekas (tombol V). Pembayaran dipotong otomatis setiap bulan.
Pembiayaan lahan biasanya menawarkan suku bunga lebih rendah.
Kepemilikan lahan berpindah segera. Anda dapat menggunakan lahan langsung.
Peringatan: Gagal membayar cicilan bulanan dapat mengakibatkan penyitaan lahan.
Pencarian %s gagal. Tidak ada yang cocok.
Agen Anda tidak dapat menemukan %s yang sesuai kriteria. Biaya pencarian tidak dapat dikembalikan. Anda dapat memulai pencarian baru jika diinginkan.
GAGAL BAYAR SEWA: Tidak dapat membayar %s untuk %s
%s terjual. Saldo pembiayaan %s dibayar dari hasil penjualan.
Gagal memulai pencarian. Silakan coba lagi.
Dana tidak cukup untuk pengakhiran sewa. Dibutuhkan: %s
Transaksi tidak valid. Silakan hubungi dukungan.
Tidak dapat menjual kendaraan sewa. Akhiri sewa terlebih dahulu atau tunggu sampai sewa berakhir.
Tidak dapat menjual. Sisa saldo (%s) melebihi harga jual (%s).
Maksimal %d kendaraan dapat didaftarkan untuk dijual sekaligus. Tunggu penjualan selesai atau batalkan daftar.
Barang murah - mungkin tidak berfungsi atau butuh perbaikan besar
Termurah yang berfungsi - mungkin butuh perbaikan signifikan
Skor kredit mempengaruhi suku bunga Anda. Tingkatkan dengan menjaga rasio utang terhadap aset rendah.
Uang muka lebih tinggi mengurangi pembayaran bulanan dan dapat menurunkan suku bunga.
Uang kembali dikurangi dari uang muka. Meningkatkan jumlah yang dibiayai.
Anda dapat melunasi pinjaman lebih awal untuk menghemat bunga. Penalti pelunasan awal mungkin berlaku.
Jaga kendaraan sewa dalam kondisi baik untuk menghindari penalti pengembalian.
Sebarkan pembayaran selama 1-20 tahun. Jangka lebih lama = cicilan bulanan lebih kecil tapi total bunga lebih banyak.
Bayar di muka untuk mengurangi jumlah pinjaman. Uang muka lebih tinggi = suku bunga dan cicilan lebih rendah. Rentang: 0-50%.
Terima uang tunai langsung (ditambahkan ke pinjaman). Berguna untuk biaya operasional, tapi meningkatkan cicilan dan total biaya.
Dipotong dari rekening pertanian secara otomatis setiap bulan dalam game. Pastikan Anda punya cukup uang!
Biaya tambahan pembiayaan vs. bayar tunai. Ini yang Anda bayar untuk menyebar pembayaran dari waktu ke waktu.
Harga beli + total bunga = yang sebenarnya Anda bayar selama masa pinjaman.
Persentase tahunan yang dikenakan pada pinjaman. Berdasarkan skor kredit dan uang muka. Lebih rendah lebih baik!
Peringkat keuangan pertanian Anda (300-850). Skor lebih tinggi = bunga lebih rendah. Tingkatkan dengan menjaga utang rendah dan membayar tepat waktu.
Sewa selama 1-5 tahun, lalu kembalikan kendaraan atau bayar nilai sisa untuk memilikinya. Jangka lebih pendek = cicilan lebih tinggi.
Pembayaran di muka. Maksimum lebih rendah (20%) daripada pembiayaan karena Anda belum memiliki kendaraan.
Jumlah yang dibayar di akhir sewa jika ingin memiliki kendaraan. Berdasarkan estimasi depresiasi. Kembalikan kendaraan untuk tidak bayar tambahan (jika kondisi baik).
Dipotong otomatis setiap bulan selama masa sewa. Lebih rendah dari cicilan pembiayaan karena tidak membayar nilai penuh kendaraan.
Uang muka + semua cicilan bulanan. TIDAK termasuk nilai sisa jika memilih membeli di akhir.
Persentase tahunan untuk sewa. Lebih tinggi dari bunga pembiayaan (5.5% vs 4.5%) karena risiko pemberi pinjaman lebih tinggi.
Di akhir sewa: kerusakan >10% atau keausan >15% = penalti hingga 30% harga kendaraan. Jaga kendaraan terawat!
Cari dealer terdekat. Respons 1 bulan dijamin, biaya 2%, keberhasilan 40%. Cepat dan murah.
Cari jaringan regional. 1-3 bulan, biaya 6%, keberhasilan 70%. Keseimbangan baik untuk sebagian besar pencarian.
Cari seluruh negeri. 2-6 bulan, biaya 12%, keberhasilan 85%. Terbaik untuk peralatan langka.
Biaya di muka dipotong langsung. Tidak dapat dikembalikan meski pencarian gagal.
Bulan dalam game sampai hasil. Anda akan mendapat notifikasi saat pencarian selesai.
Probabilitas menemukan jenis peralatan ini dalam kondisi bekas sama sekali.
Total jumlah yang masih Anda hutang di semua pinjaman dan sewa. Jaga di bawah nilai aset Anda!
Total yang dipotong dari rekening setiap bulan. Pastikan selalu punya arus kas cukup!
Peringkat 300-850. 750+ = Sangat Baik, 650-749 = Baik, 550-649 = Cukup, <550 = Buruk. Mempengaruhi semua suku bunga di masa depan!
Nilai gabungan kendaraan, peralatan, lahan, dan bangunan yang Anda miliki. Harus lebih tinggi dari utang Anda!
Total Utang รท Nilai Aset. Jaga di bawah 30% untuk kredit sangat baik. Di atas 50% sangat merusak skor Anda!
Bagian pinjaman asli yang sudah Anda bayar. Ini mengurangi saldo Anda.
Biaya tambahan yang sudah Anda bayar untuk meminjam uang. Ini TIDAK mengurangi saldo Anda.
Total bunga yang akan Anda bayar jika terus membayar cicilan minimum. Bayar lebih sekarang untuk mengurangi ini!
Biaya sekali bayar untuk pelunasan awal (biasanya 1-3% dari saldo). Dikenakan karena pemberi pinjaman kehilangan pendapatan bunga di masa depan.
Jumlah yang masih Anda hutang (pokok saja). Membayar lebih mengurangi ini lebih cepat!
Menunjukkan bagaimana pembayaran Anda terbagi: Pokok (mengurangi saldo) vs Bunga (biaya pinjaman).
Skor kredit Anda menentukan batas pinjaman maksimum dan suku bunga.
Jaminan dihitung dari 50% nilai kendaraan dan 60% nilai lahan.
Pinjaman disetujui! %s disetor ke rekening Anda.
Pinjaman ditolak. Jaminan tidak cukup atau kredit buruk.
Tidak ada kendaraan yang memenuhi syarat untuk tukar tambah
Nilai tukar tambah adalah 85% dari harga jual. Pembelian merek sama mendapat bonus 10%.
Kendaraan yang dibiayai tidak dapat ditukar tambah
Tips: Bayar tepat waktu untuk meningkatkan skor kredit. Lunasi pinjaman lebih awal untuk menghemat bunga.
50-65% nilai instan saat membeli kendaraan baru
Kendaraan ini sudah terdaftar untuk dijual
Tidak dapat menjual kendaraan yang dibiayai. Lunasi saldo terlebih dahulu.
Pembeli telah ditemukan untuk kendaraan Anda!
Penawaran kedaluwarsa untuk %s. Agen terus mencari...
Tidak ada pembeli ditemukan selama periode pendaftaran.
Anda dapat mendaftarkan ulang kendaraan ini dengan agen/pengaturan harga yang sama atau berbeda.
Tidak ada pembeli ditemukan untuk %s. Biaya agen (%s) tidak dapat dikembalikan.
Batalkan daftar penjualan untuk %s? Biaya agen TIDAK akan dikembalikan.
Mesin tidak mau hidup - coba lagi
Mesin berjuang - kecepatan maksimum turun ke %d%%!
Mesin tidak dapat mempertahankan kecepatan ini!
Mesin menunjukkan tanda-tanda pemakaian berat. Harapkan sesekali mati saat beban.
Sistem hidrolik aus. Peralatan mungkin melorot saat diangkat.
Masalah listrik terdeteksi. Peralatan mungkin mati tiba-tiba.
Kendaraan dalam kondisi mekanis yang dapat diterima.
Negosiasi harga atau anggarkan untuk perbaikan
Kondisi mekanis baik - lanjutkan dengan percaya diri
Tidak ada pencarian di baris ini
Tidak ada daftar penjualan di baris ini
Tidak ada transaksi pembiayaan di baris ini
Tidak dapat membatalkan - daftar ini siap untuk dibeli
Tidak ada penawaran tertunda di daftar ini
Tidak ada penawaran tertunda untuk ditolak
Tidak dapat membatalkan saat penawaran tertunda. Terima atau tolak terlebih dahulu.
Tidak dapat mengubah harga saat penawaran tertunda.
Harga tidak valid. Masukkan angka positif.
Jumlah tidak valid. Masukkan angka positif.
Dana tidak cukup. Butuh %s untuk pembayaran bulanan.
Dana tidak cukup untuk uang muka! Butuh %s
Tidak ada transaksi pembiayaan aktif untuk dibayar
Tidak ada transaksi pembiayaan aktif untuk dibayar
Tidak ada pembayaran jatuh tempo periode ini
Skor kredit Anda (%d) di bawah minimum (%d) yang diperlukan untuk %s.
Tips: Bayar tepat waktu pada pinjaman yang ada untuk membangun kredit.
Skor kredit terlalu rendah untuk pembiayaan. Skor Anda: %d (butuh %d+). Bangun kredit dengan pembayaran tepat waktu.
Skor kredit terlalu rendah untuk sewa. Skor Anda: %d (butuh %d+). Sewa membutuhkan kredit lebih baik daripada pembiayaan.
Skor kredit terlalu rendah (%d). Butuh %d+ untuk membiayai lahan.
Skor kredit terlalu rendah (%d). Butuh %d+ untuk membiayai perbaikan.
Jumlah terlalu kecil untuk pembiayaan. Minimum: %s
Jumlah terlalu kecil untuk sewa. Minimum: %s
Biaya perbaikan terlalu kecil untuk dibiayai. Minimum: %s
Harga lahan terlalu kecil untuk pembiayaan. Minimum: %s
Tindakan tidak diizinkan untuk pertanian Anda
Anda sudah punya sewa di lahan ini
Penawaran ditolak - agen akan terus mencari
Membeli %s - Kunjungi toko untuk mengambil kendaraan
Membiayai %s - Kunjungi toko untuk mengambil kendaraan
Mulai membuat pembayaran untuk membangun riwayat Anda
Lunasi lebih awal untuk menghemat bunga.
Kondisi sangat baik - beli dengan percaya diri
Kondisi cukup - negosiasi atau anggarkan untuk perbaikan
Inspeksi %s selesai untuk %s! Lihat laporan sekarang.
Detail lengkap + petunjuk DNA + estimasi perbaikan
Kendaraan ini dalam kondisi sangat baik tanpa masalah perawatan.
Pilih pinjaman di atas untuk mengubah mode pembayaran
PERINGATAN: Melewatkan pembayaran akan meningkatkan saldo!
Catatan: Beberapa pembayaran di bawah bunga saja
Dana tidak cukup! Butuh %s lagi. Coba pembiayaan atau sewa.
Dana tidak cukup untuk deposit keamanan! Butuh %s lagi.
Gunakan Dasbor Keuangan (Menu ESC) untuk mengambil pinjaman berbasis kredit
Pinjaman vanilla dinonaktifkan. Buka Dasbor Keuangan untuk pinjaman berbasis kredit.
Harga mencerminkan harga yang diminta penjual. Negosiasi berdasarkan hasil inspeksi.
Tips: Bayar tepat waktu untuk meningkatkan kredit. Lunasi pinjaman lebih awal untuk menghemat bunga.
Barang berikut disita karena pembayaran terlewat:
Klik untuk memilih aset sebagai jaminan (hanya aset bebas utang ditampilkan)
Dana pinjaman langsung disetorkan. Pembayaran dipotong otomatis bulanan.
Pembayaran dipotong otomatis bulanan. Pembayaran tepat waktu meningkatkan kredit!
Penyitaan ini sangat berdampak pada skor kredit Anda. Pembiayaan di masa depan akan lebih mahal atau ditolak.
Bayar tepat waktu untuk menghindari penyitaan di masa depan.
Pilih cara pembayaran: tunai langsung, pembiayaan bertahap, atau sewa dengan cicilan lebih rendah.
Pilih kendaraan untuk ditukar dan kurangi jumlah yang harus dibayar.
Bayar penuh sekarang. Nilai tukar tambah dikurangi dari total.
Cicilan bertahap. Sesuaikan jangka, uang muka, dan cashback untuk cicilan bulanan ideal.
Jangka lebih lama = cicilan lebih rendah DAN buyout lebih rendah. Uang muka mengurangi pembayaran hari ini.
Choose how you want to pay: cash upfront, finance over time, or lease the land.
Pay the full amount now to own the land outright.
Finance the land purchase with monthly payments. Adjust term and down payment below.
Lease the land with monthly payments. Rate is based on acreage and soil quality.
Higher tiers cost more but have better success rates and find higher quality matches.
Vehicle has been inspected - view report
Percentage of remaining damage to fix. 100% = restore to full condition.
Percentage of paint wear to restore. 100% = fresh factory finish.
Pay now or finance over time with monthly payments.
Hire an agent to find buyers. Higher-tier agents reach more buyers but charge more.
Agent searches for buyers. You receive offers to accept or decline.
Agent fee is non-refundable. Vehicle remains yours until sold.
Your agent is now searching for buyers.
You'll receive offers to accept or decline as buyers are found.
May get better offer, or listing expires
Select a loan above to change its payment mode
Return to dealer, pay any damage penalties
Pay residual value, keep vehicle permanently
You must choose an option. Returning gives you your deposit back. Buyout uses your equity toward purchase. Renewing extends the lease with equity applied to future buyout.
Pay on time to build credit
Enable credit scoring in UsedPlus settings to view your credit report.
Regional searches offer the best value for success rate.
Higher agent tiers have wider reach but longer wait times.
Start searches from shop via 'Search Used'
No active searches. Start from Shop.
No listings. Sell from Garage menu.
UsedPlus expands the vanilla economy with realistic financing, a used marketplace, and credit system.
Finance or lease from Shop. Trade-In old equipment. Sell via agents for better returns than vanilla.
Shop โ 'Search Used' to hire agents. LOCAL: 2%, 40%. REGIONAL: 6%, 70%. NATIONAL: 12%, 85%.
Higher tiers = wider search, better odds. Used vehicles have varying condition and hours.
Garage โ List for Sale. Trade-In: 50-65%. Local: 60-75%. Regional: 75-90%. National: 90-100%.
Condition and hours affect value. Accept/decline offers from this screen.
Determines interest rates and trade-in values. Improves through: on-time payments, completing deals. Drops from: missed payments, defaults.
Assets provide collateral but don't prove creditworthiness. Payment history matters mostโinherited land doesn't mean good credit!
Shop โ Finance/Lease/Search Used | Garage โ List for Sale
Monthly payments auto-deduct. Early payoff saves interest.
Lease allows land use without full purchase.
Land returns to market at lease end unless bought out.
Land financing has lower rates than vehicle loans.
Monthly payments auto-deduct. Pay off early to save on interest.
I'm genuinely surprised this made it to the lot.
Whoever assembled this should find a new career.
I'd tell ya to run, but I reckon this thing couldn't catch ya anyway.
I'd burn some sage before driving this one off the lot.
This thing's got more bad juju than a broken mirror factory.
My cousin had one like this. Used it for a chicken coop after. That's about all it was good for.
Some machines just come off the line wrong. This is one of them.
My advice? Budget for a lot of shop visits.
If machines could be cursed, this one surely is.
Something ain't right with this one. Can't explain it, but I feel it in my bones.
She'll run, but don't expect her to thank you for it.
This here's what we call a 'parts tractor' back home.
Might want to keep your mechanic on speed dial.
My grandfather would've called this one 'snake-bit.'
Some tractors attract trouble like a lightning rod. This is one of 'em.
She's about as reliable as a screen door on a submarine.
She'll get the job done. Eventually.
Not saying it's haunted, but I wouldn't leave it running alone at night.
Some machines carry a little bad karma. This one's got a touch.
I've seen better put together by my nephew with a wrench and some baling wire.
Standard factory quality. That's all I can say.
My gut says she'll give you a few headaches. Gut's usually right.
There's an old saying - some iron just don't want to cooperate.
Right down the middle. Nothing remarkable, nothing concerning.
She'll give you fair service for fair treatment.
It ain't fancy, but it'll plow a field same as any other.
The spirits are neutral on this one, if you believe in that sort of thing.
Not blessed, not cursed. Just... a machine.
Whoever put this together knew what they were doing.
That's a machine that'll be with you through more than a few harvests.
Got a good feeling about this one. Call it mechanic's intuition.
Some machines just want to work. This one's got that spirit in her.
This one came out of the factory right.
Now that's the kind of iron my grandpappy would've been proud to park in the barn.
Someone on the assembly line was having a good day.
My old mentor used to say some tractors are born lucky. This might be one.
There's good iron and bad iron. This here's the good stuff.
Now THIS is how they should all be built.
She's a keeper if I ever saw one.
Finer than frog hair split four ways - and that's sayin' somethin'.
If I believed in lucky stars, I'd say this one was born under a whole constellation.
Some machines got a soul. This one's got a good one.
In 30 years, I've seen maybe a dozen this well built.
This one here's got more soul than a Sunday gospel choir.
Hold onto this one. You won't find another like it.
Old-timers used to talk about tractors like this. Thought they were just legends.
This one's got guardian angels working overtime in the engine bay.
Warning: Tires are getting worn. Consider replacement soon.
CRITICAL: Tires are critically worn! Replace immediately to avoid flat tire.
FLAT TIRE! Vehicle handling severely impaired. Tire replacement required.
Warning: Low traction due to worn tires. Reduce speed in poor conditions.
Warning: Oil level is low. Service required soon.
CRITICAL: Oil level dangerously low! Engine damage occurring.
Warning: Oil leak detected. Fluid loss accelerating.
ENGINE DAMAGE: Permanent reliability loss due to running low on oil!
Warning: Hydraulic fluid is low. Service required soon.
CRITICAL: Hydraulic fluid dangerously low! System damage occurring.
Warning: Hydraulic leak detected. Fluid loss accelerating.
HYDRAULIC DAMAGE: Permanent reliability loss due to running low on fluid!
Warning: Fuel leak detected! Fuel consumption significantly increased.
ENGINE RUNAWAY! Governor failure - TURN OFF ENGINE!
HYDRAULIC LIFT FAILURE - Implement cannot raise!
HYDRAULIC VALVE FAILURE - Implement cannot lower!
Budget option - lower traction, higher failure risk
Premium tires - better traction, lower failure risk
Click a tire type to select. Higher quality = better performance.
New tires restore 100% condition. Retreads are recycled casings.
Please select a tire quality first.
Click services to select. Refills restore fluid levels to 100%.
Please select at least one service.
Drive a vehicle nearby to refill engine oil and hydraulic fluid.
Large capacity oil service point for refilling engine oil and hydraulic fluid.
Not enough hydraulic fluid in storage
Significant oil leak detected - needs immediate attention.
Minor oil leak present - may worsen over time.
Oil level critically low - top up before operation.
Oil level below recommended - needs topping up.
Oil level adequate but monitor regularly.
Major hydraulic leak found - repair urgently needed.
Small hydraulic leak detected - keep an eye on it.
Hydraulic fluid dangerously low - implements may not function properly.
Hydraulic fluid running low - recommend refill.
CAUTION: Fuel leak detected - fire hazard, needs repair.
Portable OBD diagnostic scanner for emergency field repairs. Connects to vehicle diagnostics port to read fault codes and sensor data. Consumable - single use.
OBD scan detected faults in multiple systems. Which system do you want to diagnose?
Choose the system most likely at fault - misdiagnosis reduces repair effectiveness
Based on these diagnostic codes, what is the root cause?
Cylinder misfire detected - irregular combustion pattern
Exhaust sensor: Rich fuel mixture / incomplete combustion
Power output: 40% below rated - declining trend
Starter motor cycles: Excessive cranking required
RPM fluctuation: Engine stalling under load
Idle quality: Unstable RPM at rest
High RPM misfire: Ignition timing fault
Timing analysis: Combustion occurring in exhaust
Engine status: No ignition - cranks but won't fire
Starter circuit: No current to starter motor
Relay status: Rapid clicking - insufficient power
Run time: Engine dies shortly after start
Voltage level: Below normal - lights dim at idle
Battery status: Not charging while running
Response time: Hydraulic actuators slow to move
Lift capacity: Below rated lifting force
Pump noise: High-pitched whine under load
Leak detector: External fluid loss detected
Fluid level: Dropping - external leak likely
Pressure trend: Gradual decline over time
Cleared blocked air filter - airflow restored.
Cleaned fuel filter - fuel flow restored.
Cleaned terminals and jump-started - power restored.
Topped up hydraulic fluid from kit reserves.
Right system, but diagnosis was off. General repairs applied.
Wrong system identified. Only basic maintenance applied.
Right system, but the specific cause was different.
The actual problem was in a different system.
This is an emergency fix. Visit a proper workshop for full service.
Further diagnostics on this system require workshop equipment
OBD Scanner consumed. All field-serviceable adjustments have been made to this system.
Repair in progress - cannot cancel at this stage.
No vehicle detected within range. Move the scanner closer to a vehicle.
FLAT TIRE DETECTED - Click to Repair
All tires OK - No repair needed
DTC P0xxx: Powertrain fault codes stored
Air-fuel mixture readings out of specification
DTC B/U codes: Network communication faults
Flow rate irregularities in aux circuits
No RVB data available for this vehicle
This system has already received field service. Further repairs require workshop equipment.
Mobile workshop for long-term vehicle restoration. Can restore reliability AND reliability ceiling over time. Requires diesel, oil, hydraulic fluid, and spare parts.
Warning: Restoration damage due to empty resources!
Select a component to begin deep restoration. Unlike field repairs, this process takes hours but can fully restore the vehicle.
Incorrect diagnosis. You must wait before retrying this component.
Restoration paused - need more spare parts!
Your National Agent Has a Connection
"I know a mechanic retiring from the repair business. He's got a fully-equipped service truck he's looking to sell. Cash only, but I can get you a good deal. Interested?"
The only way to save lemons
Service Truck purchased! Find it at the shop spawn point.
Opportunity saved. Check Finance Manager to purchase later.
You already own a Service Truck.
Consumable spare parts for Service Truck restoration. Place near the truck during restoration work.
Stored fault codes across all modules
Internal leak detected - pressure won't hold
Wear metals in oil: Critical levels
Pressure test: Flow but no pressure

Piston ring replacement and cylinder honing
Only the server admin can change settings.
Apply a preset configuration (changes all settings below)
Enable financing for vehicle and land purchases
Enable vehicle and land leasing with buyout options
Enable agent-based searching for used equipment
Enable agent-based vehicle sales (replaces instant sell)
Enable partial repair and repaint options
Enable trading in vehicles during purchases
Enable realistic tire degradation over time
Enable random breakdowns and component failures
How often malfunctions occur. 100% = normal, 50% = half as often, 200% = twice as often
Enable partial repairs in vehicle shop (disabling hides repair button)
Enable partial repaints in vehicle shop (disabling hides repaint button)
Scale land prices with game difficulty (like vehicles). Easy: 60%, Normal: 100%, Hard: 140%
Earn interest on positive cash balances (monthly, like a savings account)
Annual interest rate on cash. 1% = $10,000 annual on $1M balance
Enable Real Vehicle Breakdowns integration. Disable if experiencing issues with RVB.
Enable Use Your Tyres integration. Disable if experiencing issues with UYT.
Enable AdvancedMaintenance integration. Chains engine damage checks between mods.
Enable HirePurchasing integration. Hides UsedPlus Finance button (HP handles financing).
Enable BuyUsedEquipment integration. Hides UsedPlus Search button (BUE handles used search).
Enable EnhancedLoanSystem integration. Disables UsedPlus loans (ELS handles them).
Base rate for all financing (vehicles, land, loans). Credit score modifies this.
Base percentage of sell price for trade-ins
Multiplier applied to all repair costs
Multiplier applied to repaint costs (separate from repair)
Percentage markup on monthly lease payments
Number of missed payments before vehicle repossession
Minimum required down payment for financing
Initial credit score for new games
Credit score points lost per late payment
Base chance to find used vehicles. Tiers add bonuses: Economy +0%, Standard +10%, Premium +20%, Elite +30%
Maximum active sale listings per farm (internal setting)
How much condition affects vehicle price
Extra trade-in value when buying same brand
When ON, Buy/Lease buttons open UsedPlus dialog. When OFF, use Finance button instead. Disable if you have conflicts with other shop mods.
When ON, RVB's Repair button opens UsedPlus partial repair. When OFF, use Map > Repair Vehicle for UsedPlus features. Only applies with Real Vehicle Breakdowns installed.
Maximum forgiveness - focus on farming, not finance
Default balanced simulation - the intended experience
Just finance and lease - no extras
Full simulation - best with RVB/UYT mods
Default balanced simulation - the intended experience
Maximum forgiveness - focus on farming, not finance
Just finance and lease - no extras
Between you and me... they seem pretty eager to sell. Might be in a tough spot.
Between you and me... I've seen this rig listed for a while now. Seller might be motivated.
Between you and me... heard they're upgrading to bigger equipment. Could be flexible.
Between you and me... they've priced it fair and know exactly what it's worth.
Between you and me... just hit the market. Might not be in a rush to deal.
Between you and me... seems like a straightforward seller. Worth making an offer.
Plus, with that storm rolling in, they might want to close quick.
Rain's keeping everyone cooped up... good time to push for a deal.
That hail's got folks worried about their gear sitting out.
Snow falling... off-season always makes sellers more flexible.
